abstract.text: Initializes and returns a recurrence rule with a given frequency and additional scheduling information.

inlineContent.text: The frequency of the recurrence rule. Can be daily, weekly, monthly, or yearly.
The interval between instances of this recurrence. For example, a weekly recurrence rule with an interval of
occurs every other week. Must be greater than
The days of the week that the event occurs, as an array of

An array of ordinal numbers that filters which recurrences to include in the recurrence rule’s frequency. See
The end of the recurrence rule.
Negative values indicate counting backwards from the end of the recurrence rule’s frequency.

abstract.text: An object wrapper for primitive scalar numeric values.
Create, view, and edit calendar and reminder events.
A class that represents the day of the week.
A class that defines the end of a recurrence rule.
A class that describes the pattern for a recurring event.
Initializes and returns a recurrence rule with a given frequency and additional scheduling information.
An array of ordinal numbers that filters which recurrences to include in the recurrence rule’s frequency.
Set up an event or reminder that repeats.
An object wrapper for primitive scalar numeric values.
